scripts.deploy.dev: rm -rf fusebit.dev && cp -r fusebit fusebit.dev && cp -r lib fusebit.dev/ && cp fusebit.dev/package-devel.json fusebit.dev/package.json && fuse function deploy --boundary template-manager atlassian-connector-manager -d ./fusebit.dev -q
scripts.prettier: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E "\.[tj]?sx?$" | grep -v assets | xargs -P 1 prettier --write
